interactions.agent_original_response:
I’m happy to help with that. For your security, I need to verify your identity before sharing account balances.

Please confirm any two of the following:
- Last 4 digits of your SSN
- Date of birth
- Billing ZIP code
- Last 4 digits of the account number
- Registered email address or phone number

Also, do you want the balance for your checking or savings account (if you have more than one account under CUST-001)? Once verified, I’ll provide the balance right away. If you prefer, you can also check via your online banking portal or by calling us.
